name: dircolors
longDescription: Output commands to set the LS_COLORS environment variable.

options.name: bourne-shell
options.description: Output Bourne shell commands.  This is the default if the ‘SHELL’ environment variable is set and does not end with ‘csh’ or ‘tcsh’.

options.name: sh
options.description: Output Bourne shell commands.  This is the default if the ‘SHELL’ environment variable is set and does not end with ‘csh’ or ‘tcsh’.

options.name: csh
options.description: Output C shell commands.  This is the default if ‘SHELL’ ends with ‘csh’ or ‘tcsh’.

options.name: c-shell
options.description: Output C shell commands.  This is the default if ‘SHELL’ ends with ‘csh’ or ‘tcsh’.

options.name: print-database
options.description: Print the (compiled-in) default color configuration database.  This output is itself a valid configuration file, and is fairly descriptive of the possibilities.
